org.nd4j.jita.allocator.impl

Class AllocationPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.jita.allocator.impl.AllocationPoint

  • public class AllocationPoint
extends Object
    This class describes top-level allocation unit. Every buffer passed into CUDA wii have allocation point entry, describing allocation state.
    Author:
    raver119@gmail.com

      • getCudaPointer

        public Pointer getCudaPointer()
        This method returns CUDA pointer object for this allocation. It can be either device pointer or pinned memory pointer, or null. PLEASE NOTE: Thread safety is guaranteed by reentrant read/write lock
        Returns:

      • getHostPointer

        public Pointer getHostPointer()
        This method returns CUDA pointer object for this allocation. It can be either device pointer or pinned memory pointer, or null. PLEASE NOTE: Thread safety is guaranteed by reentrant read/write lock
        Returns:

      • setCudaPointers

        public void setCudaPointers(DevicePointerInfo pointerInfo)
        This method sets CUDA pointer for this allocation. It can be either device pointer, or pinned memory pointer, or null. PLEASE NOTE: Thread safety is guaranteed by reentrant read/write lock
        Parameters:
        pointerInfo - CUDA pointers wrapped into DevicePointerInfo
